channel.title: Song remake: Senbonzakura
channel.description: So I heard a song a while ago, Senbonzakura, which is a Japanese song made by Vocaliod and Hatsume Miku, but I’ve only listened to the piano version because it doesn’t get me in trouble with my family. If I can, I’ll post the link in the comments, but just so I can post this, I’ll leave it be. All I’m asking is for someone to take that piano version, and turn it into a remake, or even turn the actual song into a remake.

item.title: Song remake: Senbonzakura
item.dc:creator: anon41616463
item.description:
I plan on working on it more. Right now, I am sort of busy, but I think I’ll have time to work over the weekend. Doesn’t seem too challenging of a remake, although the grace notes are tedious in Auxy.

Read full topic

item.title: Song remake: Senbonzakura
item.dc:creator: Barrelmanboy
item.description:
Alright, i got the links.

Link 1:

https://www.youtube.com/embed/Mqps4anhz0Q

Don’t pay attention to the video itself, just pay attention to the song

Also ignore the lyrics

Link 2:

https://www.youtube.com/embed/EqegDA_DB-4

This one should be relatively easier, since it’s only a piano. The only tricky part would be to get the notes in the right spot. However, I do suggest using the chromatic notes, as it might line up a lot easier.

Good luck
Barrelmanboy

Read full topic
